snippet: The popular helmets — made by Cascade Lacrosse — will receive enhanced padding at no cost to their owners.
abstract: Cascade Lacrosse announces that it has reached agreement with National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment on modification of its Cascade Model R lacrosse helmet, which was recently decertified for safety reasons; enhanced padding will be provided to helmet owners at no cost.
lead_paragraph: The popular helmets — made by Cascade Lacrosse — will receive enhanced padding at no cost to their owners.

headline.main: Maker Agrees to Modify a Lacrosse Helmet That Was Decertified
headline.print_headline: Maker Agrees to Modify a Helmet That Was Decertified

keywords.value: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
keywords.name: organizations
